name: Builders of Sungrave
description:
Become a master Builder - the architect of destiny on a newly discovered land of Sungrave. Your beloved king has assigned you the task of building towns there for the new settlers. 
This roll-and-write board game invites you to craft a thriving medieval town from the ground up, using your wits and resources to shape the future of Sungrave Island.

This land is blessed with a wealth of materials: wood, stone, iron, and bricks. Use them to construct vital structures like a farm to feed your people, inn to rest weary travelers, harbor to trade with distant lands, bank to secure your wealth, stable to house your noble horses, and much more!

As a sign of their appreciation for innovation, the islanders will grant additional rewards to the first builder who constructs a unique structure, as they eagerly embrace new opportunities.

Knight will also send the settlers each with various talents: Knights, Merchants, Craftsmen, and Peasants. They will help you with your mission by increasing the value of buildings they want to live next to.

Manage your own tiny town, use settlers' skills to your advantage and become the governor of Sungrave Island as that is the reward for best architect among builders.

—description from the publisher
